Columns.Description: Identifier of the operation e.g. Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/listAccountSas/action.
Columns.Name: OperationNameValue

Columns.Description: Level of the event. One of the following values: Critical, Error, Warning, Informational and Verbose.
Columns.Name: Level

Columns.Description: Status of the operation in display-friendly format. Common values include Started, In Progress, Succeeded, Failed, Active, Resolved.
Columns.Name: ActivityStatusValue

Columns.Description: Substatus of the operation  in display-friendly format. E.g. OK (HTTP Status Code: 200).
Columns.Name: ActivitySubstatusValue

Columns.Description: Resource group name of the impacted resource.
Columns.Name: ResourceGroup

Columns.Description: Subscription ID of the impacted resource.
Columns.Name: SubscriptionId

Columns.Description: Usually a GUID in the string format. Events that share a correlationId belong to the same uber action.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: GUID of the caller.
Columns.Name: Caller

Columns.Description: IP address of the user who has performed the operation UPN claim or SPN claim based on availability.
Columns.Name: CallerIpAddress

Columns.Description: Category of the activity log e.g. Administrative, Policy, Security.
Columns.Name: CategoryValue

Columns.Description: Blob describing the Http Request. Usually includes the �clientRequestId�, �clientIpAddress� and �method� (HTTP method. For example, PUT).
Columns.Name: HTTPRequest

Columns.Description: Set of <Key Value> pairs (i.e. Dictionary) describing the details of the event. Stored as string. Usage of Properties_d is recommended instead.
Columns.Name: Properties

Columns.Description: Timestamp when the event became available for querying.
Columns.Name: EventSubmissionTimestamp

Columns.Description: Blob of RBAC properties of the event. Usually includes the �action�, �role� and �scope� properties. Stored as string. The use of Authorization_d should be preferred going forward.
Columns.Name: Authorization

Columns.Description: GUID of the operation
Columns.Name: OperationId

Columns.Description: Id of the resource provider for the impacted resource - e.g. Microsoft.Storage.
Columns.Name: ResourceProviderValue

Columns.Description: Unique identifier of an event.
Columns.Name: EventDataId

Columns.Description: ID of the worksapce that stores this record
Columns.Name: TenantId

Columns.Description: Timestamp when the event was generated by the Azure service processing the request corresponding the event.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Azure is used always for AzureActivity
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: Blob of RBAC properties of the event. Usually includes the �action�, �role� and �scope� properties. Stored as dynamic column.
Columns.Name: Authorization_d

Columns.Description: The JWT token used by Active Directory to authenticate the user or application to perform this operation in Resource Manager. The use of claims_d should be preferred going forward.
Columns.Name: Claims

Columns.Description: The JWT token used by Active Directory to authenticate the user or application to perform this operation in Resource Manager.
Columns.Name: Claims_d

Columns.Description: Set of <Key Value> pairs (i.e. Dictionary) describing the details of the event. Stored as dynamic column.
Columns.Name: Properties_d

Columns.Description: Management group hierarchy of the management group or subscription that event belongs to.
Columns.Name: Hierarchy

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
